title: Attempt to join que failed
body: I got this message after an aram game I played. I skipped stats then just went to que up again but this message popped up, so I closed the client and reopened to try to que again but now after I log in it goes to the black screen like it would be loading a game but says failed to connect to server.

replies.body: Ahhhh sounds like you might be dealing with a ghost game. This happens when the game server never tells your client that the match finished, so your client still thinks you need to reconnect. Ghost games need a little bit of time to clear out, have you been able to requeue yet?

Oh come on it happened rn plz fix this i got a leaverbuster ban from this and lost a placement match can you guys somehow undo my ban legit i started game crashed then brang me back to client and couldnt start match or finish other one then got a ban :( so unfair this game
